backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing branding updates and logo path changes referencing frontend/src/lib/brand.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including entrypoint, styles, branding, and layout components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router with routes for core pages and wraps them in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Email inquiry form with mailto submission, clipboard copy, validation, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand logo, quick links, contact info, and attribution using BRAND constants.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop nav, and mobile sheet menu using BRAND constants.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and a background pattern overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future queries; contains no logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode overrides, global typography, and custom utility classes for gradients and glow effects.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports centralized branding constants including logo path, name, and tagline.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and founder profiles using styled cards and gradients.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides contact information, social links, and an inquiry form layout using cards and interactive styling.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Implements the landing page with a hero section, CTA buttons, and quick contact cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotFound.tsx: Displays a 404 error page with navigation options to return home or go back.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Shows a list of influencer marketing services with icons, descriptions, and a featured service section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, animations, typography, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing the Upliftkar websiteâ€™s structure, branding requirements, known issues, and implemented features.
